/usr/bin/c++    -rdynamic CMakeFiles/stereo_test.dir/stereosgm_image.cpp.o  -o stereo_test  -L/usr/local/cuda/lib64 -Wl,-rpath,/usr/local/cuda/lib64:/home/comp/qiangwang/software/lib /usr/local/cuda/lib64/libcudart_static.a -lpthread -ldl -lrt ../../src/libsgm.a /usr/local/cuda/lib64/libcudart_static.a -lpthread -ldl -lrt /usr/local/cuda/lib64/libnppi.so /home/comp/qiangwang/software/lib/libopencv_highgui.so.2.4.9 /home/comp/qiangwang/software/lib/libopencv_imgproc.so.2.4.9 /home/comp/qiangwang/software/lib/libopencv_core.so.2.4.9
